Thomas Ades: Music for 21st Century is a music documentary produced by LWT Productions in 1999. The documentary is based on the musical journey of Thomas Ad√®s, a famous British composer, pianist, and conductor, focusing closely on two works: "Asyla", an orchestral work; and "Powder Her Face", an opera. The documentary was directed and produced by Gerald Fox, and was showcased on Channel 4.
